title: NHAI Recruitment 2026 - Apply Online for 06 Chief General Manager Posts
description: The National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for 06 Chief General Manager Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NHAI Recruitment 2026 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply online before the last date.
